data.name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Fantasy Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
This costume pack features the 12 members of the Taranis crew in fantasy-based attire.
You can modify what the children are wearing under "Change Costumes" in the Options menu.

Contents:
Fantasy Costumes for Malt, Mei, Hanna, Kyle, Boron, Socks, Chick, Hack, Sheena, Jin, Wappa, and Britz (can be used during intermission and expedition)
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This costume pack features the 12 members of the Taranis crew in fantasy-based attire. You can modify what the children are wearing under "Change Costumes" in the Options menu.
data.supported_languages:
English, French*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, German, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 940, 3.0 GHz / Intel Core i3-2100, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 460, 768 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD A10-7850K, 3.7 GHz / Intel Core i3-2125, 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 TI 3GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card or onboard chipset
